title: What To Gift The Most Fashion-Forward Person In Your Life
description: This holiday season, we’ve found the gifts that feel great to get and even better to give. Shop Well-Received, our collection of editor-approved holiday gift guides, here.We understand the challenges of shopping for the fashion-obsessed folks in your life. As style lovers ourselves, we seem to own all the basics, have tried all the trends, and are already onto the next. Still, Refinery29 is dedicated to helping our readers navigate holiday shopping in a more informed way — and that includes finding the best gifts for the aesthetes and otherwise hard-to-shop-for tastemakers in your life.Here, you'll find stylish sleepwear sets, statement bags, cold-weather accessories, festive jewelry, and more. And while we can’t fit everyone's aesthetic to a T, we hope this roundup will inspire your gifting, especially with sartorial gems you haven't considered yet (like bow-adorned glassware and cashmere-scented candles). Ahead, discover the 24 best gifts for fashion lovers.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Damson Madder Tie Neck BonnetAll the fashion girlies (and Refinery29 editors) have been wearing Damson Madder. Browsing the brand’s new arrivals, we were struck by its winter accessories selection — specifically this bonnet — for holiday gifting. The striped knit hood is perfect for keeping your giftee warm and on-trend.Shop Damson MadderDamson Madder Tie Neck Bonnet, $, available at Damson MadderFree People Shoe Charm & Pin PackWe know about the resurgence of charm necklaces at this point, but what about shoe charms? Free People has quite a few packs intended to be hooked onto your laces, straps, and buckles. They make for a unique (and cost-friendly) gift.Shop Free PeopleFree People Shoe Charm & Pin Pack, $, available at Free PeopleFreja Mini Chrystie BagYour fashion-obsessed friend has definitely seen many TikTok-viral handbags on their FYP, and Freja has likely made an appearance or two. The vegan leather styles are chic, each a unique twist on classic shoulder and tote silhouettes. But the best part, which will ensure this bag lasts season after season, is that the durable material is water-resistant and scratch-proof.Shop Freja New YorkFreja New York Mini Chrystie Bag, $, available at Freja New YorkSkims Knit Unisex RobeAs we skimmed through Skims’ viral holiday collection, this trendy leopard print robe caught our attention. The unisex luxe robe is perfect for the cozy connoisseur in your life (and can also be purchased in classic black and dark green plaid). Shop SkimsSkims Knit Unisex Robe, $, available at SkimsBoy Smells Cashmere Kush CandleIf your giftee has cashmere taste, but you’re not on a cashmere sweater budget, consider a cashmere-scented candle instead. This opulent scent from Boy Smells is powdery, woody, musky, herbal — and it’ll make any space smell and feel luxurious.Shop Boy SmellsBoy Smells Cashmere Kush Candle, $, available at Boy SmellsVuori Hudson Insulated Shine JacketPuffer jackets are always a good idea, reliably keeping us warm in the cold winter months — and there are super stylish options out there now. Check out Vuori’s Hudson in a new iridescent green colorway that’s festive yet versatile. Shop VuoriVuori Hudson Insulated Shine Jacket, $, available at VuoriAna Luisa Starry Eyed Earring BundleIf you’re looking for tarnish-resistant gold jewelry, then look to Ana Luisa. The editor-approved brand offers affordable yet durable jewelry, and its bundles are especially cost-effective and gift-worthy. Check out these dazzling earrings, which can be stacked together or worn separately. Shop Ana LuisaAna Luisa Starry Eyed Earring Bundle, $, available at Ana LuisaEberjey Inez Washable Silk Printed Long PJ SetWe love a silk pajama set, but we love a machine-washable silk pajama set even more. Splurge on your favorite fashion friend with a top-rated Eberjey set in a colorful print that matches their personal style and vibe. It’ll ensure they lounge luxuriously.Shop EberjeyEberjey Inez Washable Silk Printed Long PJ Set, $, available at EberjeyPat McGrath Labs SatinAllure LipstickPat McGrath is responsible for some of the most iconic beauty looks of all time — and this year alone, she had a hand in such fashion spectacles as the Maison Margiela Artisanal Spring/Summer 2024 runway and the Met Gala. While your giftee may not lean towards a dramatic porcelain doll skin look, they may desire a luxe satin-finish lipstick in a bow-adorned tube. Shop SephoraPAT McGRATH LABS SatinAllure Lipstick, $, available at SephoraJonathan Adler Eden Pickleball SetFor that one friend who can’t stop playing pickleball, upgrade their game with a new paddle set. This Jonathan Adler snake-printed one is vibrant, fashion-forward, and will boost your giftee’s confidence on the court. Shop Jonathan AdlerJonathan Adler Eden Pickleball Set, $, available at Jonathan AdlerRelax Lacrosse Bows Lacrosse PantThis Lisa Says Gah new arrival the perfect blend of sporty and sweet. The bow-adorned athleisure pants are a great statement piece to round out your giftee’s street-style wardrobe and to pair with their trending polo shirt for preppy looks.Shop Lisa Says GahRelax Lacrosse Bows Lacrosse Pant, $, available at Lisa Says GahApparis Coco GlovesGloves and mittens are classic holiday gifts. But we’re sure your giftee is anything but average, so cart up a style that’ll stand out from the crowd. These pink faux fur mittens with fleece lining will no doubt put a smile on their face and elevate their winter looks. Shop ShopbopApparis Coco Gloves, $, available at ShopbopBrandon Blackwood Jacqueline Patent Leather Chain Shoulder BagBrandon Blackwood is known for his bold, luxurious handbags, and we promise that any fashion girly will love receiving one of his styles this holiday season. While the boxy trunks are best-sellers, step out of the box with a slimmer (yet still statement-making) shoulder bag. Shop Neiman MarcusBrandon Blackwood Jacqueline Patent Leather Chain Shoulder Bag, $, available at Neiman MarcusLoveShackFancy Pink Floral Jewelry BoxFor the friend with an extensive jewelry collection, give them a new jewelry box to hold their favorite pieces — but not just any box: one with LoveShackFancy’s iconic pastel floral print. It’ll be a whimsical addition to your giftee’s vanity.Shop Pottery BarnLoveShackFancy Pink Floral Jewelry Box, $, available at Pottery BarnAnthropologie Cheers Embroidered TeeYou’ll likely be clinking glasses throughout the holiday season, so cart up an equally cheery T-shirt for your favorite party buddy. This embroidered Anthropologie top can be worn throughout the New Year and beyond. Bonus: It’s available in standard, petite, and plus sizes. Shop AnthropologieAnthropologie Cheers Embroidered Tee, $, available at AnthropologieFP Movement x Hoka Clifton L Suede SneakersWhether your giftee is an activewear- or street style-lover, they’ll fall head over heels for these limited-edition Hoka sneakers. Just as fashionable as they are functional, these blue suede shoes will be much-appreciated. Shop FP MovementHOKA X FP Movement Clifton L Suede Sneakers, $, available at FP MovementLele Sadoughi x Wicked Glinda Sequin Bow BarretteIf your giftee is a musical theater buff, you’ll want to pursue the many Wicked fashion collabs on the market right now. Lele Sadoughi’s accessory collection is actually inspired by the Broadway show rather than the upcoming film adaptation, and this cheerful bow captures its whimsy perfectly. Shop Lele SadoughiLele Sadoughi x Wicked Glinda Sequin Bow Barrette, $, available at Lele SadoughiIris Apfel’s Colorful: A Treasure Trove of Inspiration, Influences, and Ideas BookIris Apfel’s autobiographical photo book was published a few months later after the fashion icon passed away in 2024 at 102 years old. It covers the maximalist’s philosophy on living and design, as well as 300 personal photo, and will make for a colorful coffee table book. Shop AmazonIris Apfel Colorful: A Treasure Trove of Inspiration, Influences,, $, available at AmazonSavage x Fenty Undercover Softie 3-Piece SetSavage x Fenty’s holiday collection is full of cozy sets, loungewear, and winter accessories, all of which are gift-worthy. We’re eyeing the three-piece sets, including this plush sweatshirt, short, and bucket hat combo.Shop Savage x FentySavage x Fenty Undercover Softie 3-Piece Set, $, available at Savage x FentyMaison Balzac Black Bow Coupes SetPerfect for new homeowners, holiday party hosts, or the home décor-obsessed, this hand-blown glass set makes for a thoughtful gift. The cute bows add a fashionable flair that’ll never go out of style.Shop SsenseMaison Balzac Black Bow Coupes Set, $, available at SSENSEPandora Essence Organically Shaped Stacking RingsThis editor loves her Pandora stacking rings, and wears them almost daily. The puffed rings are curvy, fluid, and fit perfectly together. They will also complement any other gold jewelry your giftee wears, and can easily transition from casual day looks to dressy night looks.  Shop PandoraPANDORA Organically Shaped Stacking Rings, $, available at PANDORAStarface x Hello Kitty Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch & Compact Case SetHello Kitty simply never goes out of style, as proven by the delightful collaborations that keep coming out starring the character. This Starface collaboration is particularly fashion-y, and you’ll find your giftee happily dotting their faces with the decorative pimple patches.  Shop Urban OutfittersStarface x Hello Kitty Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch & Compact Case Set, $, available at Urban OutfittersAlo Faux Fur Ear WarmersChic ear warmers don’t need to cost you a pretty penny. This faux fur headband from Alo comes in under $60, but doesn’t skimp on the après-ski vibes. The limited-edition toasted almond colorway will certainly complement and elevate your giftee’s winter wardrobe. Shop Alo YogaAlo Yoga Faux Fur Ear Warmers, $, available at Alo YogaAveda x Altuzarra Limited-Edition Nightbloom Cosmetic Bag This collaboration blends fashion and beauty, and we simply love it. The makeup bag features a botanical motif from Altuzarra, which was inspired by the natural elegance of nature.Shop AvedaAveda x Altuzarra Limited-Edition Nightbloom Cosmetic Bag, $, available at AvedaThe New Year New Me Baguette Bag Enjoy what remains of 2023 with a sequin embellished baguette bag. The glittery Coach purse wants to tag along to all the holiday parties. While we're planning to leave a few things behind, this bag is coming with us into the new year. Shop CoachCoach Studio Baguette Bag With Sequins, $, available at CoachThe Peek-A-Boo Layering Top If your stressed-out friend needs to let loose a little, gift them a flirty sheer embroidered top that they can layer. The top has a high neckline and thumbhole details and comes in a rainbow of enchanting colors. Shop Free People Intimately | Free People Lady Lux Layering Top, $, available at Free PeopleFor Love And Lemons Bonnie Cropped BlazerOversized blazers are great, but has your giftee tried a cropped version? Let them add a polished yet trendy touch to their attires. They can style the cropped houndstooth print blazer with wedding guest dresses, over button-downs, or silk blouses for the office or holiday ensembles. Shop For Loves And Lemons For Love And Lemons Bonnie Cropped Blazer, $, available at For Love And LemonsThe Ultimate Holiday Dress We all need a bit of sparkle in our lives. Add it to your giftee's collection of holiday dresses with Abercrombie & Fitch's sequin V-neck midi dress. The silhouette has long sleeves to stay warm, but a plunging neckline adds some sultriness.Shop Abercrombie & FitchThe Finish Line To A Flawless Après Ski LookTop off your giftee's festive winter looks with oversized faux-fur earmuffs. The luxurious piece features a bedazzling chain of hand-sewn jewels across a black satin headpiece, making it a fashionable statement piece for cold-weather ensembles. Shop Hill House HomeHill House Home The Noor Earmuffs, $, available at Hill House HomeThe Versatile Cashmere Wrap Quince is known for its rich collection of affordable cashmere attire. One of the brand's bestselling pieces is this elegant convertible wrap that can double as a scarf. Although it may look thin, Quince has noted that it's three times as warm as wool. Shop QuinceQuince Mongolian Cashmere Wrap, $, available at QuinceThe Contemporary Pearl NecklaceWhen you think of pearl jewelry, the first person you may think of is your grandma. But this pearl necklace from Kendra Scott is a modern interpretation that any fashion-lover would swoon over. It merges a trendy gold chain with a string of pearls for a piece that is anything but stuffy. Shop Kendra ScottKendra Scott Ashton Gold Half Chain Necklace In White Pearl, $, available at Kendra ScottSelkie The Starry Night Day Dress While Selkie is famous for its airy and pastel fairylike mini dresses and floral printed babydoll princess gowns, the brand has added more striking patterns with deep shades. For example, this dreamy dress is inspired by Van Gogh's most famous painting, Starry Night, and would be a prized gift for the art lovers in your life. Shop SelkieSelkie The Starry Night Day Dress, $, available at SelkieThe Viral Belt Bag Everyone knows the Lululemon belt bag for its sleek nylon exterior. Now, the latest edition is making a statement with its textured fleece for a cozy aesthetic. The belt bag has joined the trend of fuzzy purses and has returned to break the internet once more for its appearance and roominess. Shop LululemonLululemon Everywhere Belt Bag 1L Fleece, $, available at LululemonThe Cozy Luxe Cashmere Beanie Keep your loved one's head cozy in a soft, lightweight beanie this winter — there are five gorgeous shades to choose from. If you're looking for a full set, Jenni Kayne also has a fashionable scarf to match. Shop Jenni KayneJenni Kayne Cashmere Beanie, $, available at Jenni KayneThe Luxurious Silk Sleep SetBecause fashion shouldn't be restricted to waking hours, treat your giftee to an elevated pajama set that they'll adore. Eberjey also has released a holiday collection in festive colors and prints.Shop EberjeyEberjey Inez Washable Silk Printed Long PJ Set, $, available at EberjeyThe Comfy & Chic Travel Pant The Alo High-Waist Pursuit Trousers are effortless and breathable. They are the stretchy travel pants that'll take you from the office to the airport. With a seamlessly flat trouser-inspired front, elastic waistband in the back, and relaxed fit, you'll want to jet-set off to your next vacay. Shop AloAlo High-Waist Pursuit Trouser, $, available at AloThe Sultry Sweater Dress Winter gatherings are here, and Skims has crafted a figure-hugging off-the-shoulder sweater dress that'll sweep every guest off their feet. The sultry one-piece is stretchy and lightweight, so it fits your giftee — or yourself. We're not the gift police.Shop By Anthropologie at Anthropologie By Anthropologie Off-The-Shoulder Slim Sweater Midi Dress, $, available at AnthropologieThe Edgy, Sleeker City BootWe know that pointed booties are nothing new. But, somehow, this classic black knee-high pair from Reformation manages to look more refined with its stiletto heel and the edgy angled collar. The best part is that the shoe is part of Reformation's extensive sale. Shop Reformation Reformation Rosemary Knee Boot, $, available at ReformationThe Timeless Personalized Jewelry NecklaceEveryone should have at least one piece of jewelry that has their name on it, whether it's an engraved signet or a simple chain with a monogram charm strung on. Kinn allows you to customize your necklace, from the chain type, length, and number of letters for an heirloom piece you or a loved one will cherish forever. Shop KinnKinn Dear Kaia II Nameplate Necklace, $, available at KinnThe Elevated Wedding Guest Dress Gear up for wedding season in the spring with a ruched one-shoulder Norma Kamali dress in celadon green. You can even take inspo from the model and add a bit of contrast by cinching your waist with a white or black belt. In the meantime, you can style it for luxurious holiday soirées or work events. Shop Norma Kamali at RevolveNorma Kamali Diana Gown, $, available at RevolveThe Shamelessly Trendy HandbagThe fact that this handbag is called "Candy," is a banana-yellow hue, and is part of Mansur Gavriel's sale? We must have it. It's an expensive bag, but whatever, it's the holidays and our affiliate writer says it's worth every penny. Ask for what you want. Shop Mansur GavrielMansur Gavriel Candy Hobo Bag, $, available at Mansur GavrielThe High Fashion Coffee Table BookAfter you pre-order our talented R29 fashion writer's Little Book of Bottega Veneta and wait for its release, explore the in-depth story of the legendary fashion house of Dior. The pretty-in-pink hardcover makes a lovely coffee table to gift to any Dior fan or fashion enthusiast for the holidays. Shop at AmazonThe Little Book The Little Book of Dior, $, available at AmazonThe Breakfast At Tiffany's Print There are a number of legendary moments in Breakfast at Tiffany's. One of them is Audrey Hepburn wearing her Givenchy LBD and pearls while window-shopping with a Danish in hand. Any true fan of the movie will recognize the iconic moment and adore this chic print. Shop East Urban Home at WayfairEast Urban Home Audrey Hepburn Window Shopping Canvas, $, available at WayfairThe Starter Statement RingWhen it comes to ring folks, there are two main types: people who go big and chunky and those who do delicate and dainty. A fab in-between ring, however, might actually be able to please both camps. And these colorful ones from Monica Vinader are all-around classics.Shop Monica Vinader at NordstromMonica Vinader Power Cocktail Ring, $, available at NordstromThe Extra Large Alpaca ScarfCount us in for any oversized items that exude that cuddly, cozy vibe. That includes this super-long alpaca-wool scarf that always tops the chart every winter. Shop Acne Studios at SSENSEAcne Studios Beige & Red Alpaca Check Scarf, $, available at SSENSEThe Fashion Person's Travel EssentialThose who feel naked without their jewelry know that keeping their collection tangle-free while traveling is its own unique stressor. Luckily, Mejuri's monogrammable jewelry case keeps everything organized and easy to find. Shop MejuriMejuri Travel Case, $, available at MejuriLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?25 Luxe Gifts For The Favorite People On Your List24 Gifts For Gen Z They'll Actually Approve Of25 DIY Gift Ideas For Arts & Crafts Lovers

Photo: Courtesy of Neiman Marcus.

This holiday season, we’ve found the gifts that feel great to get and even better to give. Shop Well-Received, our collection of editor-approved holiday gift guides, here.

We understand the challenges of shopping for the fashion-obsessed folks in your life. As style lovers ourselves, we seem to own all the basics, have tried all the trends, and are already onto the next. Still, Refinery29 is dedicated to helping our readers navigate holiday shopping in a more informed way — and that includes finding the best gifts for the aesthetes and otherwise hard-to-shop-for tastemakers in your life.

Here, you'll find stylish sleepwear sets, statement bags, cold-weather accessories, festive jewelry, and more. And while we can’t fit everyone's aesthetic to a T, we hope this roundup will inspire your gifting, especially with sartorial gems you haven't considered yet (like bow-adorned glassware and cashmere-scented candles). Ahead, discover the 24 best gifts for fashion lovers.

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.
